resources.string: The Black Shark 3 is both vertically and horizontally symmetrical on the back, so you can feel the balance between your two hands. The back of the Black Shark 3 is curved and has two diamond shapes that are slightly raised to support your hands. So you can easily control your device no matter how you hold it.

AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors
 Always-on display
 90Hz refresh rate
 500 nits typ. brightness (advertised)
 HDR10+
6.67 inches, 107.4 cm2 (~82.4% screen-to-body ratio)\n 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~395 ppi density)\n

Li-Po 4720 mAh, non-removable
 Fast charging 65W
, 100% in 38 min (advertised)
 Fast charging 30W (128/8 model)
 Magnetic charging 18W
 Fast charging: up to 7 hours of use from only 15 minutes of charging
